website_summaries.verdict: A top drug test for those who prioritize convenience and affordability.
pros: Drug test's ability to detect opiates in urine is six times greater than many other drug tests
Provides testing for marijuana, cocaine, opiates, methamphetamines, and amphetamines
cons: Test lines may appear blurry and smudged at times

customer_reviews.title: Consistent False Positives. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly surprised at how many positive reviews this has, maybe I got a bad batch. Regardless I would NEVER purchase these again. I was testing myself regularly for pre-employment to ensure I would not have any issues. I purchased multiple brands of tests just in case there were any issues, this was the ONLY test that consistently showed false positives. I had no problem passing any other at home test and in fact passing a lab test for a job and getting the job. I’m very happy I purchased other products that were more accurate than this one. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: NYGirl13

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This thing tested me positive for THC and I don’t even smoke weed!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed. I checked so many other 'urine dip' drug tests online and found these to be the best, which ended up being correct. Completely worth every penny. I specifically needed a low cutoff for opiates and these tests did just that! Without fail. Literally lol
customer_reviews.author: D.D.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: kept reading positive
customer_reviews.text: I used the whole box over a period of 2 weeks and it came up positive every time for THC- i used another test that came up negitive every time- for my work drug screening i was negitive leading me to believe these test are not the most accurate- i would come up negitive for everything on this test except for THC granted i have used THC products in the past month it had been well over 3 weeks and i am by no means a heavy user
customer_reviews.author: ashleexox576

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this was because I tried hemp oil which. Is thc free 0.3% the most in a 1000mg bottle. THERE should be no positive reading for 3 doses which add up too 99mg.However if you took the whole bottle there could be a positive reading according to my RESEARCH.2 tests said I was positive for thc and negative for opiates.I am taking 2 prescription painkillers so it should have been positive for opiates but it said it was negative and then positive for THC that's why I bought another test kit for THC which I was interested in and that came back negative totally unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: alex 1215

customer_reviews.title: Bogus tests do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend used these and tested positive for THC, but hasn’t smoked in 5 months. We were freaking out wondering how THC got back in his system (he gets drug tested for probation regularly) so I asked my mom to take one. She came back positive for THC also and smoked once when she was 15 years old (she’s 56 now lol) so clearly these are NOT ACCURATE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage, with consistent false positives.
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the worst of this kind of drug test. I go to a clinic where I am tested twice a month & the tests are sent to a lab for confirmation. I very rarely use marijuana & when I do I use edibles. I hadn't taken any in almost 2 months & every test taken with this brand came back positive for THC. Please, do not support this brand, save your money & time. The only test I've ever found to be reliable is the "Easy @ Home" brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to..
customer_reviews.text: I have used these off and on for years, for many different reasons. They are accurate and simple to use. Helpful tip: buy some cheap plastic cups to pee in. It's much cheaper to buy these and supply your own cups then to buy the ones that have the cup. Do not worry if the lines are faint. It doesn't mean anything, it's still negative. I've used my own pee to check that and sometimes it's just a faint line. I've never had a positive on something that shouldn't be there. Or a negative on something I know is there. These are very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: In date but defective
customer_reviews.text: Son needed to pass a drug screen for a new job. bought these to make sure he could, but 3 of the 5 I bought showed positive for him. We knew he could pass but couldn't figure out why it was positive, so I took 1 of them, I have never smoked pot but sure enough, it showed positive on me.,but did not catch my opiates that I take daily. good price but wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to test my friend before a job drug fest. It was spot on. It is CLIA waived which is an important asset when considering these tests. As an MA this was an easy to read and from the use, pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Howard

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. I am a lab tech so it was confusing at first that a line is actually a negative result. Totally opposite of how most tests are in the lab I work at. lol
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Ilacqua

customer_reviews.title: Can literally use water to pass your tests 🤣🤣
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to see if my boyfriend was doing drugs, well he wasn’t for those curious 🤣 But for kicks, I took one and it said I was dirty for my prescription so that’s accurate BUT for even more kicks I ran one test under some water...all registered as passing lol haha
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Briana Lee

customer_reviews.title: ...no guessing to distinguish positive from negative...
customer_reviews.text: I run 1/2 Way Houses, and I use these 5-Panel dips instead of my full blown, 12-Panel Cups (...SAME supplier, here on Amazon... search: "12 Panel Drug Test Cup with BUP") when I want to do a test of the more common substances I have found to be of most concern with my guys. These are FAST and dependable... no guessing to distinguish positive from negative (look closely) as with other inferior products I've used in the past. You DO need specimen cups, but these guys have them also, and they're cheap enough. GOOD product !
customer_reviews.author: Phil C.

customer_reviews.title: has showed false negatives
customer_reviews.text: this has showed false negatives so don't always believe somebody is clean just because this shows negative
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Needed to test my THC levels for a drug test and these were GREAT! I was detoxing and I could see the line getting lighter and lighter. I really feel like this helped me pass my test with flying colors! BUT please follow the directions! Urinate in a cup and barely dip it in. DONT urinate directly onto the sticks it will not work!!
customer_reviews.author: Frostbite

customer_reviews.title: Not the most accurate for testing THC
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I take CBD and wanted to make sure I didn't fail a drug test for THC. The first test failed for THC, so I stopped taking the CBD and still consistently failed for THC. I take adderall and also failed for amphetamines, so I thought the test was accurate.. until I tested my bottled water and it failed for THC (passed for amphetamines) as well. I won't be using these for THC testing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jatanna Willis

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know
customer_reviews.text: I was stupid and didn’t read the instructions fully at first so I wasted a few tests and then was still stressed out because one of the lines was SO faint. I hope these things actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: This drug panel SUCKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheap made.. When putting the end back on after dipping it almost impossible because they are so flemsy.. Very poorlymade and a person can tell that once the product is open.. But by that time it's not returnable so your stuck with these bubble gum machine panel drug test that's NOT ACCURATE WHAT SO EVER
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Pearman

customer_reviews.title: These failed to work.
customer_reviews.text: This has shown false negative results twice. I have caught my son using thc vape shortly after testing and found out that he was using only 1 day prior to one of the tests. These results have been wrong 2 out of 2 times on a proven thc user. However, I am a non drug user. It did post clean for me. So 1 out of 1 on non drug user. I would NOT purchase these again nor recommend them. False negative results give a false sense of trust.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It
customer_reviews.text: Tested dirty for THC after 35 days. Bought the easy@home pack and was negative even though I used both brands the same day. I bought the five pack of these and every single one was a false positive. Notice that the manufacture doesn't even respond to the bad reviews? Tells you all you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Eromoh

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Percocet
customer_reviews.text: Tested my girlfriend ..she takes 2 percs a day for her back and every single test came back negative for opiates. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate drug test used for my partner. Great to have around if you live with teens or an ex addict.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use so cheap! Used these because I didn’t want to be that parent with her head in the sand! So easy to use, read, very accurate
customer_reviews.author: TROYS music

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews and should have listened.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and should have listened. My husband tested positive for THC using these test, but hasn't don't anything in over a month. So I figured I would try a test to see if it's accurate as I'm 100% certain I'd pass... I failed too lol. These test aren't accurate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Williams

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I tested myself on day 36 of not smoking, (I am 5' 4" and 102 lbs and I smoke everyday, only like a bowl or two after work...more on the weekends), THC still showed up positive with the test...I bought synthetic urine and used it for the pee test on day 37...I had a little left in the bottle and used the test on it when I got home from taking the pee test and it showed negative....so I think it's pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: cathe carr

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: The product was very east to use and accurate when tested against other products. I'll never look anywhere else for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, my two on the left with negative for THC and my husbands on the right with a positive. He’s an everyday smoker whereas I am not a smoker at all. I suppose the other reviewers are right in that the first three lines are always light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as advertised, Make sure to remove cap, to expose test strips, A1 product.
customer_reviews.author: bee zee

customer_reviews.title: Still said he was dirty when he said he was clean
customer_reviews.text: But they work pretty well. Im not sure how accurat they are they said he still had some in his system 2 weeks after. So thats good.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This product worked as intended and I'm about to order ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as intended and I'm about to order more in a few days. Low price and works, not something you find every day.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Sibauste

customer_reviews.title: Test gives false positive for THC
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money because it gives a false positive for THC. I know it’s wrong because I used it on myself and got a false positive result! Waste of time and money and it’s sad to think about all of the people getting in trouble from this useless test kit!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I'm on pain management and take opioids. These strips said I wasn't
customer_reviews.author: SHADES

customer_reviews.title: False reading for thc
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t smoked weed in over a month and popped positive in every single on of these in my 5 pck. I purchased another brand with two tests and tested negative. This test is not very accurate for thc. I am 4”11 and 100 pounds no way thc is in my system for over a month after not smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: They work. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: These work and are easy to use. Have a cup ready though.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Accurate and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank you for the ease of using this product. The instructions are clear, simple and precise.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: INACCURATE TEST
customer_reviews.text: Product dose not work. I went through two boxes and kept getting false readings. T H C panel kept say positive. after 50 days I new something wasn't right. I had someone who I know doesn't do T H C. She tested POSITIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about accuracy
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. Of all the tests I have tried they were probably the least accurate/effective. One of the test areas showed up as negative (light line) that I know for a fact should have been positive. I'm not going to use these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use urine tests
customer_reviews.text: These 5 panel drug test dips are compact and easy to administer so long as you already have specimen cups for your urine sample. We have used this same brand's all-in-one cup tests and like them but dip tests are more budget friendly, especially when drug testing frequently. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: WorldTraveler

customer_reviews.title: tested on myself
customer_reviews.text: From what I can tell these are super accurate. Super easy to use and understand Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Got negative results using tap water! I mistakenly thought it would read invalid. Nope!
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Quick, and easy results
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered in like two days from date of purchase. Came in handy to ensure urine was clean for a job interview. Would definitly purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good price reliable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and seemed reliable once I passed using these went to a clinic for a lab test for work and passed that as well. Good price and easy to use and read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to be just as reliable as one I paid 20 for 1 test. Will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy smith

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These test are extremely inaccurate! Tested positive for THC even though I’ve been clean for months. I even had someone who has never smoked try one and they had the same results. Would recommend the 5 panel @ home easy drug test brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Isas

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and well packaged and explained. I have used other products and quality here is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: troy shtogren

customer_reviews.title: Faulty dont waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: I took 5 im a row...knowing im clean....i was trying to prove a point to my pot smoking kid!. This test said i was dirty for all kinds of things!!
customer_reviews.author: angela kilgore

customer_reviews.title: This says that he didn't use marijuana but he is ...
customer_reviews.text: This says that he didn't use marijuana but he is a heavy marijuana smoker. . . So this test is b.s.
customer_reviews.author: 123Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product and company to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered promptly and works exactly as I expected. I would recommend this product and company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These are the same ones that my husband on federal paper is tested with! They actually work!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarzmom1

customer_reviews.title: I got a dud
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions and got nothing with this one...I have 1 left and will try again y tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Bringas

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, effective & Wallet friendly
customer_reviews.text: These are great for at home or a quick test before you go take one documented for potential employers
customer_reviews.author: TCPCAKE

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Product is satisfactory for it's purpose but, there were no test cups provided.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, easy to read, results in 5 minutes, small amount of specimen required.
customer_reviews.author: Dipper

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely came in clutch when I needed it in a hurry. High quality without the expensive price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hersheway

customer_reviews.title: ... have only used 1 so far and it was pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used 1 so far and it was pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: K Stone

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. This should be off the market for false positives for THC
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Krol

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: These work extremely fast and we’re very accurate. I failed all 5 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Grantj

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Was not sure but it totally works. 3 stars only bc I had to find my own cup. Just beong honest.
customer_reviews.text: Worked. Was pretty iffy but it worked and it comes in a pack which is even better bc at local drug stores theae test cost 22$ just for one test. INSANE!!! But I reccommend. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steffy

customer_reviews.title: awesome! I used this to test my urine and ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome! I used this to test my urine and then to test some synthetic urine and it was 100% correct on both. Its also cheaper than a lot of other 12 panel test and there are 5 individual tests.
customer_reviews.author: slim

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The 5 Panel test strips work just as they should. Have not experienced any false positives either.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works good but one area was undetected. It was blank
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and great way to verify results instantaneously!
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Gave false reading. Purchased another drug test at drug store and it was right on.
customer_reviews.author: Mammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and understand. fast shipping fast results.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Plant

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed and easy to follow instructions were included. Does not come with a specimen cup, but that is typical for these tests. Not a big deal. The results were accurate because the test results were as I expected based on my teenage son's admission. Also if the individual is taking a stimulant for ADHD such as Adderral or Vyvanse the test should show positive for AMP (Amphetamine). My son takes this drug daily and sure enough he tested positive for it. That was further reassurance that the test is accurate. There is a separate column for Methamphetamine, which would include crystal meth. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it works properly or I’m doing wrong
customer_reviews.author: Haris

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!!! So thankful I found these. ...
customer_reviews.text: Reliable!!! So thankful I found these. I was purchasing one at a time for 30 a pop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Showed up meth- never have I ever have even seen meth
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drug test my boyfriend and to convince him to take it I accepted to take one myself... I know for a fact I have not taken, ingested, or handled "meth" ever, let alone in the past 3 days. It showed up that I had Methamphetamines in my system. So, now my boyfriend won't take any because "he doesn't want to give false positive" I know his excuse is b.s. But what argument do I have?!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Do not use these!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Three people who don’t use any form of drugs failed for different drugs.
customer_reviews.author: Olliesmama

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected superb quality with an even better price 10 out 10 will definitely order from here again
customer_reviews.author: Teva M.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read, lines were blurry and smeared
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like them. Hard to read, lines came up smeared looking and blurry. I believe the "Easy at Home" drug tests are easier to use and much clearer to read. These seem cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Invalid
customer_reviews.text: Hi, so far 3 out of 5 of the tests have shown "invalid" on all of the test strips. I'm not sure if I just got a bad batch or what.
customer_reviews.author: Marli

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, zero absorption
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be faulty from the beginning. I was simply curious. Poor packaging, zero absorption... I failed AMP, I’m assuming adderal. I don’t take speed at all. I intake THC daily. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Brentammons

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and great price
customer_reviews.text: Very much appreciate the labeling, boxing and instruction sheets. I have bought other brands that are not labeled, and when you have several tests in your drawer (alcohol, nicotine) and they look very similar in the white foil pouch it’s can be frustrating. These tests have been proven to be very accurate and I’m grateful to have affordable testing for my kids. (Although the teenagers aren’t so grateful.)
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate for the most common factor (THC)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be certain of no issues with my new job coming up. I was 99% sure there was nothing to worry about, but I need this job more than the $10 safety net this item would provide me (or so I thought). Imagine my surprise when not only I tested positive for THC, but my wife as well (whom despises and never touches the stuff). I'm simply around it and don't partake, so like I said, I'm 99% sure there's nothing to worry about, but now that my wife failed, I'm 100% sure it's inaccurate. These results are after multiple tests by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tests to put the fear into my teen. I tested myself first to make sure they worked. Good news I'm not on drugs and neither is my teen! They appear to be accurate, but on both tests the THC line was faint. Assuming neither one of us has smoked (you never know what's in those bake sale cookies) this must be a minor defect in the product. It only took about 30 seconds to get the results, so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck out there.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for using at home or the office. We use them for DOT compliance for a couple of drivers, and I tested them today and the results were very easy to read, lines were clear and there were no issues. The instructions were also very easy to follow. We will be ordering more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Dave&Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, multiple false positives for THC
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to validate clean state for pre-employment drug screen - resulted in multiple false positives for THC, tested same urine sample in triplicate with these tests - x3 positive or non-negative for THC, tested same urine sample in triplicate with alternate manufacturers’ test which confirmed (known) negative result in triplicate (2 of 3 alternate kits pictured at right in photo). Recommend recall batches sold in 2019, recommend revalidate chromatography / test strips.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to do a drug test for an internship. They suggested that I buy this $30 test but I'm a broke college student so I got these ones instead. They worked great and my internship starts next week. :D
customer_reviews.author: Traumfanger

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect at home test easy to use and accurate at a great price. Shipping is fast too. Please they have excellent customer service if you have any questions or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teen boys. I almost had a heart attack the first time I read it, cause even though I read the directions, when lines started showing up I was second guessing it and pre-tripping. either way. They were clean. Praise God!
customer_reviews.author: James wells

customer_reviews.title: Bad test. Pick another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good test. I took 5 in a period of 2 months and came up positive for THC all 5 times. I don’t use marijuana. I was testing myself for opiates which I use for an injury and it never shows positive. Even if it’s the day after I take it. Waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Gives false positives, not accurate do NOT rely on these results. Get a different brand. Stated positive and negative for the same drug on 2 different strips at the same time. I repeat DO NOT rely on this test!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Easy, accurate, came on time
customer_reviews.text: As a medical professional who has written user manuals on point of care tests, I can say that this works well and is easy to use. Quick shipping and receipt. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these in a variety of capacities over the years and they’re always reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Maga2020

customer_reviews.title: Not as reliable as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on my kid who has a problem with pot. I know he smoked a day or two before I tested him, but there was a faint line. The faq says that even a faint line is a negative. Was not accurate in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to test a family member and they were able to detect drug use days past normal test time frames. I have reordered and will again reorder these again.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskazon

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test my fiance, who has struggled with meth and cocaine usage. He smokes pot on a regular basis and these tests showed negative for all 5 panels. I know he should have registered for the marijuana at least, so it makes question the validity of the other 4 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Coulson

customer_reviews.title: a real bargain on a useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I manage a sober-living house so drug tests are a necessary tool. These work as well as other tests priced 3 or 4 times the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False positives for 2 months now. Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Constant false positives for THC. I have been using this test for 2 months now and it's the same, false results. Complete garbage. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ares

customer_reviews.title: Spring for a couple to double check
customer_reviews.text: Showed what should be and shouldn’t be there. Only problem I came across was some questionable pink line where it definitely should not have been.. worrisome but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this...
customer_reviews.text: Very good item. Very easy to use and read. Will get more and recommend this item for anyone who could use this to test themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jagoss765

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: These saved me from failing a drug test for a new employer. True to scale, very accurate and quick!
customer_reviews.author: cameron russell

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel about them
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I really wasn’t clean yet or the test were just wrong, but if you smoke every day for past 2 years, it must take either more than 4 months to get clean or the tests just aren’t right. I waited 4 months and according to them I still had it in my system.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worked like a charm! Simple and fast results!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for me
customer_reviews.text: No problems with these test. Gave me the info needed for husband to apply for job.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Goheen

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm...not 1 "false" positive!!
customer_reviews.text: Accurate and affordable. Would buy again. Not 1 "false" positive for thc....Shocking.... But then again, I DONT SMOKE WEED. LOL. jus sayin people....
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Not completely great quality but I would order again out of convenience and price
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and fast shipping of these but I do not like the fact that half the time it seems as the sticks are shifting into each other and the lines are normally very hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First 3 tests were invalid.
customer_reviews.text: First 3 didn’t ever work. They were invalid. And I followed directions. Then the fourth one only half way worked. I just needed tests that worked! :(
customer_reviews.author: Haley Kight

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. Must remember to have your own specimen ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. Must remember to have your own specimen cup handy as kit comes without. Easy to use with small plastic disposable cups
customer_reviews.author: janp

product_meta.title: 5 Pack Identify Diagnostics 5 Panel Drug Test Dip - Testing Instantly for 5 Different Drugs THC, COC, MOP, MET, AMP ID-CP5-DIP (5)
feature_bullets: Expiration date for this drug test dip is on or better than: JUNE 30, 2021
CLIA Waived / 510k Cleared. IMPORTANT: Wait a full 5 minutes before reading results. Some T-Lines may appear instantly & some may require up to 5 minutes to react fully to the urine specimen.
Over 99% accuracy in detecting drugs according to the recommended cut-off levels: Amphetamines AMP, Cocaine COC, Marijuana THC, Methamphetamines MET, Opiates / Morphine MOP
Collection cups not included. REMOVE CAP BEFORE DIPPING, dip in urine for 15 seconds. 2 lines appear if negative, 1 line if positive.
Used by national rehabilitation facilities, home office drug testing, workplace, educational institutions, pain management, family practice, hospitals, drug courts, law enforcement, staff agencies
